posts.post_content:
$725 net I will cover tracked bubble mailer shipping. Paypal friends please if goods add 3%.  Sold comment trumps on going negotiations. Card is posted in a few places. Thanks

PSA has 3 of these graded in pop report. Not sure on SGC as there pop report is still being worked on.

Card does have dinged up bottom left corner.  Is missing start of his name.
